runs.comm: wow, what a start, he's gone for it first up, pitched up outside off and he launches him over mid-off, it's a couple of runs, Gambhir gave chase, slid and dragged it in, his right foot was in the air over the ropes, but no contact with the ropes so it's fine
beaten this time, tries to open the face, goodish length and it nips away as he flirts with it, misses
short and wide, goes for the cut but makes no contact, went hard at that one
lovely delivery, in the channel outside off stump, nipping away to just go past the outside edge
slides that one on the pads, gets across a bit but can't make contact with the bat, clips the pads and rolls down to fine leg for a single
goodish length on leg stump, turns that one behind square towards fine leg for a single
short of a good length on the off, got that one to curve in a little, gets on the back foot and defends
gets on the back foot and tries to open the face to play that behind point, ends up dropping it into the off side, they steal a quick single
swings hard at that one, bowled on a length outside off and he drags it uppishly through midwicket for a boundary, didn't time it well but he found the gap
shortish on the off, nicely done there by Shahzad, rocks back and guides that wide of third man for a couple of runs
pushed on a length on the off, gets forward and punches that to mid-on
good, sharp bouncer from Irfan, Shahzad moved away and attempted a shot in vain, was taken by surprise there, ended up going through to the keeper
short of length ball outside off, guided down to third man
that one is down the leg side, the batsman was looking to glance that, looked awkward as he tried that, he misses and it is off the thigh pad to Dhoni
short of length ball is dabbed towards cover for a quick single
length ball on the pads, a casual flick to deep square leg, Balaji has a long chase from fine leg, enough time to take three

there's the promised helicopter! Afghanistan's MS whips that powerfully towards the midwicket boundary, doesn't move his feet as he throws his bat at that delivery, is very pleased with himself after dispatching it to the boundary, emphatic
not as emphatic this time, an outside edge as he looks to push one to the off side, wide of slip for four more
short of length ball outside off, looking to pull that one, then decides against it and softly defends it
guides it down to third man for a single

Balaji bowling from wide of the crease, bang in the bouncer, high and wide of off stump, the batsman looks to the square leg umpire asking whether that was too high, Taufel says that is one bouncer for the over
short of length and outside off, guided towards third man, wonderfully timed that one, Zaheer under pressure there to cut that off at third man, batsmen steal the second
the Mohammad Shahzad show is over, he was swinging at everything, this time he doesn't connect properly, an edge loops towards mid-on, Yuvraj is waiting for that, Afghanistan lose their first wicket
short of length ball just outside off, defended towards point
there's the inswing Irfan usually gets with the new ball, cramping the batsman who manages to defend to the leg side
short of length ball on leg stump, looks to pull that one, doesn't connect properly and the ball loops onto his body
looking to crash that length ball through the covers, miscues it back towards the bowler
this he connects, and how! similar length and outside off, smashed on-the-up for four, superb hit
swinging in towards the pads, defended down towards the bowler
length ball shaping in again, struck on the pads and there's a polite appeal for lbw, that was sliding down
angling in from wide of the crease, whipped behind square leg for a single
length ball outside off, wafts at it and misses
a bouncer from Balaji, a delivery he uses quite often these day,s batsman ducks
dabbed towards cover point, Rohit lunges towards it, batsmen zip through for one, Rohit tries to throw down the stumps but concedes an overthrow
a full ball outside off is gracefully guided towards deep point

not a shot you'll see in the coachin manual, a massive sweep from Mangal who seems to have realised that this is the last ball of the Powerplay, sends the ball high and beyond the midwicket boundary, a short of length ball that Mangal charged out to before hammering it
works it to deep square leg for a couple
short of length ball outside off, clipped towards midwicket
spins in towards the pads, calmly taps it towards midwicket
no shortage of confidence from these Afghanistan batsman, a length ball from Rohit is bludgeoned down the ground, too fast for long-on
played with soft hands towards square leg, Balaji is the fielder and he can't prevent the second, Dhoni not thrilled with that fielding
works it to midwicket to end the over

strikes first ball! a straight length delivery heading for leg, Mangal misses and he is struck in front, Taufel thinks about it for a bit before raising the finger, Afghanistan have lost their captain, can they maintain their momentum?
length ball outside off, punched towards long-off
a full ball strikes Sadiq on the pads, going down
full and wide, the batsman reaches out for it and just about reaches it
down the leg side again, batsman swings and misses
a touch short from Yuvraj, heading for middle and leg, batsman waits on the back foot and works it to deep midwicket
length ball outside off, guided towards third man
disdain from the batsman, a flighted ball is launched one-handed over the bowler's head, how he got that much power on that shot is a mystery
length ball on the stumps, looking to work it to the leg side, a leading edge to the off isde
bowling from round the stumps, well wide of leg stump
length ball on middle stump, defended down the track
on off stump, length ball, is swept towards midwicket for a singl
there's the variation, the ball that moves away, this doesn't spin away dramatically, just a little, enough to beat the batsman, and off stump, the batsman had no clue about that one
skipping down the track and defends to the leg side
length ball not too far outside off, slapped off the backfoot past a diving backward point, another boundary
tries a cute shot there, a sort of paddle towards short fine, in the air for a bit but lands short of Zaheer there
guided towards backward point for a single
a stylish flick towards deep midwicket, not too far from Gambhir but Afghanistan still manage to take two
length ball sliding on to the pads, struck outside leg stump
defended off the front foot to the off side

Dhoni misses a stumping, not a line I've had to type often, Ashwin sees the batsman charging out and pushes it down the leg side, past the batsman's legs, Dhoni couldn't collect it cleanly, the batsman was several yards out and had given up
guided to short third for a single
played towards sweeper cover
swiped towards deep midwicket for a single
flighted ball is pushed towards extra cover
on the pads and that is worked to square leg
eased to long-on for a single
Yuvraj gets his second, Karim Sadiq is gone, he went for the heave to midwicket, a top edge and the ball swirls to Gambhir at deep midwicket, Gambhir settles under it and collects it calmly

and another one for Yuvraj, who may not have set the stage alight with the bat but he has got his third with the ball, gets this one to spin away after drifting in, a thin outside edge and Dhoni doesn't make another mistake, two new batsmen at the crease
no hat-trick, a length ball is pushed towards cover, off the middle of the bat for a single
short of length ball outside off, defended towards cover
looking to drive that through the off side, inside-edge it onto his boot, just two off that over, and two wickets as well

Afghanistan falling apart here, Shenwari chips it back to Ashwin, and that's the third wicket in six deliveries, they are now 76 for 5, it was a length ball on middle stump, nothing dangerous about it, but that was tamely pushed back
eased towards long-on for a single
now to long-off for a single
length ball outside off, steered towards backward point
full ball on the pads, nudged behind square leg for a single
length ball outside off, worked to mid-off for a single
flamboyant hit from Moihammad Nabi, a flighted ball and that is launched high and straight for a huge six, that looked terrific
follows that with a single to long-on
defends that to the off side
looking to sweep, that is top-edged but lands safely on the off side
a terrible delivery that, a half-tracker that sat up, and it is absolutely hammered, no doubt at all that that would carry all the way, powerfully struck to the midwicket boundary
short of length ball outside off, chopped towards cover, despite the two sixes in the over, Yuvraj finishes with 3 for 24
short of length ball angling in, inside-edged towards square leg
looking to work that to the leg side, struck on the body
driven-on-the-up, short of length ball is slammed between extra cover and cover for four, Nabi is now 14 off 8
looking to push it to the right of the bowler but Irfan is quickly across
short ball on leg stump, pulled towards deep backward square leg for a single

that looked like a huge inside-edge there, a short of length ball on off and middle, the batsman was looking to work it to the leg side, struck on the pads but it sounded like an inside edge there, Rauf thinks there is not bat involved and lifts the finger
no fear at all from these Afghans, Zaheer is welcomed with a contemptuous hit over extra cover, a flamboyant and clean hitting this, awesome to watch from Nabi
on the pads, that is helped along to deep backward square leg for two
drilled down the ground to long-off
what a shot that is, full toss on the pads and that is put away in style, to the deep backward square leg for four more, this is turning out to be an extremely expensive over
another full toss and Nabi misses out, looks to power the ball but miscues towards midwicket
full ball on leg stump, pushed towards mid-on for a single, 16 off the over
a length ball, carrom delivery, outside edge towards point
Ashwin pauses before delivering, it is a short ball that is worked to midwicket
short and down the leg side, batsman swings and misses, off the pads and past Dhoni
swings this one towards deep midwicket

Ashwin has got the dangerman, he pauses an eternity before delivering, waiting to see what the batsman will do,  Nabi charges out to meet the delivery, looks to hammer it but edges it, loops towards mid-off where Rohit awaits
the carrom ball first up, watchfully defended by Gulbodin
short and down the leg side, poor start from Balaji
length ball angling across, an effortless hit towards sweeper cover, I was waiting to for the camera to pan out and show the fielder in the deep, there wasn't one, a nonchalant boundary
worked towards sweeper cover for one
there's the Balaji bouncer, the batsman looks to club that to the leg side, misses

slow bouncer this time from Balaji, looking to pull again but misses, struck on the body, Najibullah has a hamstring problem and has been struggling to run, he sets off for a single, Naib wasn't interested which meant the hobbling Najibullah has to turn back and try make his ground, the throw from Dhoni is to the bowler, Balaji collects and breaks the stumps with his arm, early enough to beat the dive from Najibullah, after many replays, the umpires are convinced it is, Afghanistan lose their eighth
shortish ball is slapped towards deep square leg for a single
looking for an adventurous shot, walking across the stumps and trying to help it to fine leg, he misses and the ball sails over middle stump
shortish and outside off, looks to chop that over point and misses
Irfan oversteps, a short of length ball angling in, the batsman looks to hammer that to the leg side but mishits it
a low full toss is sent towards sweeper cover, Naib declines the single, no the smartest move at this stage, especially when you have made 4 off 11
top-edges that shortish ball, loops over the bowler's head, lands safely between mid-on and mid-off
a bouncer from Irfan, scares the No. 10 batsman, who waves his bat at it and misses
pitched up and that is crashed through extra cover, powerful hit that, 28 off 7 now
a slower ball, full and outside leg, the bastman skips away beyond leg stump and murders that to the midwicket boundary, 24 needed now off the final over
a bouncer to start, batsman looks to pull but can't connect
nine down now for Afghanistan, Naib tries to send the ball into orbit, sends it only as far as Raina at mid-off, it was a short ball from Balaji again
game over, Balaji finishes it off with a yorker, Afghanistan lose but they have not been disgraced, the first match of the tournament which wasn't completely one-sided
